titleStmt.title: The ymage of loue Here foloweth a goostly pamphlete or mater co[m]pendyously extract of holy scrypture, and doctours of ye chyrche, called ye ymage of loue, very necessary for all vertuous persones to loke vpon.
Ymage of love.
titleStmt.author: Ryckes, John.
Gough, John, fl. 1528-1556.

publicationStmt.publisher: In the Flete strete at the sygne of the Sonne by Wynkyn de worde,
publicationStmt.date: The yere of our lorde. M.CCCCC. [and] xxv. [1525] The vij. daye of October]

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 21473 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
